articles.content: Unless you're glued to Animal Crossing: New Horizons pretty much 24/7, collecting a decent number of Star Fragments can really take a while. One of the less common crafting materials, Star Fragments can usually only be obtained by wishing on a shooting star, … [+1221 chars]

articles.title: Unofficial Club Penguin server gets axed by Disney after it's found full of "penguin e-sex" - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: An unofficial Club Penguin fan server is getting the axe after a BBC report found it full of explicit sexual and racist messages.
articles.content: Remember Club Penguin? It was successor to the online kids game throne after the Neopets craze of my own childhood. Disney Interactive shut down the kiddie MMO back in 2017 but fan clones have lived on. The unofficial Club Penguin Online is now going offline … [+2358 chars]

articles.title: Windows 10 on ARM Could Soon Support 64-Bit x86 Apps - Thurrott.com
articles.description: Windows 10 on ARM still has far too many limitations to recommend, but one of the most serious may soon be eliminated.
articles.content:
Windows 10 on ARM still has far too many limitations to recommend, but one of the most serious may soon be eliminated. According to a recent code commit on GitHub, Microsoft is preparing to add support for 64-bit x86 application emulation to the platform.
Ad… [+1728 chars]
